definition: (to do sth) with dispatch/as soon as possible

from/through/via/to follow/to obey/to engage in (an activity)/never (in negative sentence)/(Taiwan pr. [zong4]) retainer/assistant/auxiliary/subordinate/related by common paternal grandfather or earlier ancestor

sentences.english: No one in the office promised a quick answer to the matter.
sentences.chinese: 办公室没人答应对此事从速作答。

sentences.english: The market is declining. we recommend your immediingested contentment.
sentences.chinese: 市场在萎缩，我们发起你方从速接受。

sentences.english: I ran to the platform quickly, but the train had already left.
sentences.chinese: 我从速跑到站台上，可是火车已开走了。

sentences.english: He has promised his supporters that he is going to pull out as quickly as possible.
sentences.chinese: 他向支持者承诺将尽快从速从伊拉克撤军。

sentences.english: He promised me a quick answer.
Since the up price is topic to alteration, we urge you to socate ywe order promptly.
sentences.chinese: 鉴于以上价格估计还有改动，咱们请您务必从速订货。

sentences.english: Maybe a more polite way is “at your earliest convenience.
sentences.chinese: 或许更客气的说法是“在您方便时，务请从速回复”。

sentences.english: You'd better be pretty smart about the job.
sentences.chinese: 这项工作你最好从速去做。

sentences.english: As soon as possible to see the meteor tell how?
sentences.chinese: 从速看看流星告诉的怎么样了？

sentences.english: The situation comedy is going to start soon. Just switch to channel one.
sentences.chinese: 气象笑剧从速就要先河了，快调到一频道。

sentences.english: He has promised his supporters that he will pull out as soon and as quickly as possible.
sentences.chinese: 他向支持者承诺将尽快从速从伊拉克撤军。

sentences.english: Network storage space, there are time constraints, please download as soon as possible.
sentences.chinese: 网络空间存储，有时间限制，请从速下载。

definition: this or that very day/in the next few days
to bring to justice/to punish according to the law
to punish (someone)/to take disciplinary action against (someone)
to help oneself to (food)/to invite (trouble)/to court (disaster)
time and tide wait for no man (idiom)
must/to need to/to be sure to
to eradicate evil completely (idiom); thorough in rooting out wickedness
